backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing two‑bidder auction logic, including state, bidding, selling players, and round management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking spectator‑screen requirements to frontend files and components with metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files and their roles in the auction app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining theme variables, dark mode tokens, and global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that mounts the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling navigation between setup, auction, results, and audience screens.
frontend/src/components/auction/AuctionS: Main auction UI enabling starting rounds, placing bids, selling players, and displaying live auction data with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auction/Audience: Read‑only spectator view that polls backend state to show current player, bids, bidder budgets, and sold/unsold players.
frontend/src/components/auction/guards.t: Contains validation logic for setup inputs and bid amounts, ensuring names, counts, and budgets are valid.
frontend/src/components/auction/ResultsS: Displays auction results, showing bidder rosters, spending, and sales history using data from useAuctionState.
frontend/src/components/auction/SetupScr: Provides a form to configure two bidders and ten players, validates input, and initializes a new auction.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with navigation, header, footer, and routing controls for auction screens.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuctionQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching auction state and performing auction actions like initialize, start, bid, and sell.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, exposing identity state and login/logout handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and theme CSS variables for light/dark modes with a sports‑auction color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrors.ts: Provides helpers to normalize and clean backend error messages into user‑friendly text.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Contains formatting helpers for amounts, player status, and highest‑bidder display.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and OKLCH‑based theme tokens.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, features, issues, and architectural notes for the auction application.
